mapper.insert: insert into board2_reply ( rno, seq, reply, writer, wdate, mdate ) values ( #{rno}, #{seq}, #{reply}, #{writer}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: update board2_reply set reply = #{reply}, mdate = now() where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select rno, seq, reply, writer, wdate, mdate from board2_reply where seq = #{seq} order by rno asc
